http://gameinfocenter.com/pc-games/system-requirements/LEGO-Batman-2-DC-Super-Heroes.html

Minimum system requirements

OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista or Windows 7
CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 3800+ - 2 * 2000 Mhz
Memory: 1GB RAM
Graphics Card: NVIDIA 7600, 7800, 8xxx or better, ATI 1950 or better
Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible Audio Device
Hard disk space: Installation requires 10GB of free hard disk space.
Microsoft DirectX 9.0c (March 2009) is installed together with the game unless this or a more up to date version is already installed.
